name: fabulous
content:
fabulous adjective
(GOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
very good; excellent: absolutely fabulous She looked absolutely fabulous in her dress. They've got a fabulous apartment in the centre of Paris. We had a fabulous time at the party.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
extremely pleasant, enjoyable, or likableexcellentThe food was excellent, thank you.wonderfulHave a wonderful trip!terrificThat's such terrific news, congratulations!fabulousI love her dress, it's fabulous.greatThe film was great.
